comments.body: I am confused.  Why do we have the file both as a separate (unused) file and an embedded fragment?

If I use include statement here, I need to be sure that include path like `$ROOTSYS/io/io/res` will be always provided - 
in cling, in ACLiC, in user-derived code. 
After this PR I want to change this in master - one should use normal include from the beginning and it should be placed 
in `$ROOTSYS/include/nlohmann` if no other standard location is provided. But this just a fix for current issue
